attributes.name: description
attributes.description: A textual description of the package

attributes.name: remote_size
attributes.description: The package's size in bytes in package form

attributes.name: local_size
attributes.description: The package's size in bytes when installed

attributes.name: explicit
attributes.description: Whether the package was explicitly installed by a user

attributes.name: licenses
attributes.description: The licenses under which the packages is distributed

attributes.name: dependencies
attributes.description: A list of packages that this packages requires

attributes.name: usages
attributes.description: A list of packages that require this package

attributes.name: build_timestamp
attributes.description: The epoch timestamp when the package was built

attributes.name: install_timestamp
attributes.description: The epoch timestamp when the package was installed
